title: Future Improvements Tracking System
description: Structured repository for continuous improvement ideas and their implementation tracking

improvement_categories.performance: Runtime efficiency, algorithm optimization, resource utilization
improvement_categories.architecture: System design, module organization, pattern implementation

improvements.title: Test-Driven Development Framework Enhancement
improvements.description: Create standardized test templates and pre-written test stubs based on implementation plan specifications to reduce debugging iterations from 40% to <15% of implementation time.

improvements.title: Configuration Management System
improvements.description: Externalize hardcoded heuristics (DOMAIN_KEYWORDS, patterns) to JSON/YAML files with modular configuration loader for easier maintenance and rapid iteration.

improvements.title: Development Environment Optimization
improvements.description: Automated pytest configuration, pre-commit hooks for type checking and formatting, eliminate manual PYTHONPATH setup to remove environment friction.

improvements.title: Slash Command: /project:retrospective
improvements.description: Create Claude Code slash command for instant access to structured 5-action meta-reflection methodology with argument support for different contexts.
improvements.implementation_plan: Create .claude/commands/retrospective.md with structured template using $ARGUMENTS placeholder

improvements.title: Circular Self-Improvement Workflow
improvements.description: Use strategy-architect to plan implementation of its own improvements. Revolutionary dogfooding at meta level: Phase Complete → Meta-Reflection → Ideas → Strategy-Architect → Implementation.

improvements.title: MCP Tool: strategy-retrospective
improvements.description: Develop strategy-retrospective as official MCP tool to extend cognition beyond planning to continuous improvement, returning structured analysis + actionable improvement backlog.

improvements.title: Performance Optimization: Keyword Extraction
improvements.description: Pre-compile regex patterns, use set operations for keyword matching to improve from O(n²) to O(n) complexity for large descriptions.

improvements.title: Phase Implementation Automation Scripts
improvements.description: Create automation for module skeleton generation, test stub creation, and integration validation to standardize approach and reduce manual errors.

improvements.title: JSON Schema Validation Framework
improvements.description: Implement comprehensive JSON schema validation for phase_templates.json using Pydantic models to ensure configuration robustness and early error detection.

improvements.title: Template Inheritance Framework
improvements.description: Implement template inheritance system with base templates and domain-specific extensions to reduce duplication and improve maintainability of phase templates.

improvements.title: Critical Path Algorithm Optimization
improvements.description: Replace recursive DFS with iterative topological sort and memoization for critical path calculation to improve performance from O(n²) to O(n) for large dependency graphs.

improvements.title: Enhanced Error Diagnostics System
improvements.description: Add detailed error context with file locations, field validation, and correction suggestions to improve debugging experience for configuration and validation errors.

improvements.title: Template Inheritance System
improvements.description: Implement base templates with domain-specific extensions for both phase and task templates to reduce duplication and improve maintainability across the configuration system.

improvements.title: Pattern-Based Task Intelligence
improvements.description: Enhance task generation to dynamically adjust based on detected analysis patterns (real_time, integration, dashboard, etc.) for more contextually appropriate tasks generated automatically.

improvements.title: Enterprise Scalability Framework
improvements.description: Performance optimization for large-scale projects (100+ tasks, complex dependencies) including iterative algorithms, caching, and scalability testing for enterprise deployment readiness.

improvements.title: Advanced Resource Optimization Framework
improvements.description: Implement genetic algorithm optimization for complex resource allocation scenarios with 100+ tasks and multi-dimensional constraints. Includes advanced load balancing, specialization optimization, and dynamic capacity adjustment.

improvements.title: Dynamic Agent Profile Learning System
improvements.description: Performance-based agent profile adaptation and capability learning system. Tracks assignment outcomes, adjusts specialization scores, and evolves agent capabilities based on demonstrated performance and feedback.

improvements.title: Mission Map Visualization and Monitoring
improvements.description: Generate Gantt charts, resource utilization graphs, and TDD workflow diagrams using Mermaid integration. Includes real-time monitoring capabilities, progress tracking, and stakeholder communication enhancements.

improvements.title: Enhanced Debug Payload Content
improvements.description: Extend debug_payload with timing per stage, memory usage metrics, workflow decision points, and intermediate state snapshots for comprehensive debugging experience.

improvements.title: Dynamic Log Level Management
improvements.description: Runtime log level changes and tool-specific log levels for operational flexibility. Includes API endpoints for log level control and granular component-based logging configuration.

improvements.title: Structured Error Context System
improvements.description: Implement structured error codes, recovery suggestions, and enhanced error context with taxonomy and automatic resolution guidance for faster error resolution.

improvements.title: Prometheus Metrics Integration
improvements.description: Implement Prometheus-style metrics export for operational monitoring including workflow performance, success rates, and resource utilization tracking for production environments.

improvements.title: Cross-Workflow Session Tracking
improvements.description: Advanced trace correlation across multiple workflow executions for user journey analysis and session-based debugging capabilities with persistent trace storage.

improvements.title: Real-Time Debugging Dashboard
improvements.description: Live workflow visualization with WebSocket streaming for real-time debugging, performance monitoring, and workflow state inspection. Transforms developer debugging experience.

improvements.title: AI-Powered Error Analysis
improvements.description: Machine learning-based pattern recognition for automatic debugging suggestions, error prediction, and intelligent troubleshooting guidance for autonomous debugging capabilities.

improvements.title: IA-IA Collaborative Architecture Framework
improvements.description: Systematic framework for multi-AI architectural analysis with convergence validation and divergence resolution protocols. Enables two or more AI systems to independently analyze complex problems and synthesize superior solutions through structured collaboration.

improvements.title: MVP-First Validation Checkpoints
improvements.description: Systematic checkpoints in planning workflows to prevent over-engineering and ensure pragmatic solutions. Implements validation gates that enforce 'minimal viable' approach before allowing complexity additions.

improvements.title: Semantic Domain Classification Engine
improvements.description: Advanced domain detection using semantic analysis instead of primitive keyword matching. Enables intelligent task classification for CLI tools, web development, data science, infrastructure, etc.

improvements.title: Stage-Based Workflow Engine Architecture
improvements.description: Refactor monolithic strategy-architect into granular stage-based execution with workflow_stage parameter. Enables collaborative workflows while maintaining backward compatibility.

improvements.title: Confidence-Driven Collaboration Triggers
improvements.description: Intelligent triggers that determine when MCP should pause and request Claude collaboration based on domain confidence, context clarity, and task complexity metrics.
